name: FirstNet by AT&T
description: Dedicated first responder network with priority access starting at $42.99/month
fullDescription: FirstNet is America's dedicated wireless network for first responders and public safety, built as a public-private partnership with the federal government. Provides priority access and dedicated bandwidth during emergencies.
whatTheyOffer:
- Dedicated wireless network for public safety
- First Priority access during emergencies
- 5G connectivity with low latency
- Over 2.99 million square miles of coverage
- 25% savings on family lines
- FirstNet Fusion push-to-talk and 9-1-1 integration
- Device financing offers available
howToGetIt:
1. Visit firstnet.com to check eligibility
2. Eligible: law enforcement, fire, EMS, 911 dispatchers
3. Also eligible: healthcare providers, utilities workers, school safety
4. Sign up online or at AT&T/FirstNet retail locations
5. Plans start at $42.99/month for individuals
6. Agency plans also available
keywords: FirstNet, AT&T, first responder, police, firefighter, EMT, EMS, 911, emergency, priority network, public safety, healthcare, utilities
